Tenancy.description: Records details about the tenancy agreement between a housing provider and a tenant.

TenantID.description: Foreign key referencing the primary tenant.

AddressID.description: Identifier of the property address linked to the tenancy.

StartDate.description: The start date of the tenancy.

EndDate.description: The end date of the tenancy, if applicable.

TenancyType.description: Type of tenancy (e.g., fixed-term, assured, introductory).

TenancyStatus.description: Current status of the tenancy (e.g., active, ended, paused).

TenantPerson.description: Information about the tenant, typically the primary person named on the tenancy agreement.

ContactDetails.description: Contact information such as phone or email.

VulnerabilityFlag.description: Indicates whether the tenant is considered vulnerable.

PersonAlertCode.description: Code representing a person-level alert related to the tenant.

HouseholdMemberPerson.description: Details of individuals living in the household who are not the primary tenant.

HouseholdMemberID.description: Unique identifier for the household member.

TenantID.description: Tenant this household member is associated with.

TenancyID.description: Tenancy this household member belongs to.

FullName.description: Full name of the household member.

DateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the household member.

RelationshipToTenant.description: Describes how this person is related to the tenant.

IsContractHolder.description: Indicates whether this person is a contract holder.

PersonAlertCode.description: Alert code linked to the household member.

RiskAssessmentStatus.description: Status of any risk assessment conducted.

RiskAssessmentDate.description: Date when the risk assessment was conducted.
